transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir, Reemi here sir.
Customer: Good evening, tell me now.
Executive: Yeah sir, this side Reeman speaking from IndiaMART, we had a word with you. Uh, we need to connect at five. Can we connect now? See, I think we are connecting for the second time again. As I said for the first time, it is still the same thing again.
Customer: Whatever the leads I'm supposed to get, the primary thing I am supposed to get on interlocking bricks in and around Kurnool, not 200 or 3 kilometers away.
Customer: The maximum radius where it works out for any client is still 100-150 kilometers. If it goes beyond that, it the deal won't happen.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, can you hear me?
Executive: Yes sir. Sir, uh, yes, yes, I'm hearing you. But can you tell me your exact problem with IndiaMART services? Can you tell me? You are giving, uh, I am opening your, uh, your voice is little low sir, man. Give me a minute, give me a second sir, give me a second.
Executive: Give me a second sir. I'll forward to, it will be clear. Give me a second, yeah. So sir, are you, you are dealing in interlocking fly ash brick, uh, all type of UHC, hollow porous brick, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Right. Then, uh, okay. So please tell me your exact problem with IndiaMART buyleads, inquiry and, uh, other issues which you have raised in the past.
Customer: Go to my buyleads now.
Executive: Yeah, I'm seeing your buyleads.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: What is the first one I have? Fly ash bricks of 5000 pieces.
Executive: Yes, fly ash brick from Bellary, Karnataka.
Customer: Okay. From Bellary, right?
Executive: Yeah. Bellary is around 150 kilometers from Kurnool.
Executive: Uh, it's, yeah.
Customer: And I'm selling a brick for 6 rupees. Assume I'm cracking this deal for 6 rupees.
Executive: No, no, no, sir. Listen, listen, listen first, listen first.
Customer: If I'm cracking this deal for 6 rupees for a brick, who will take the accountability for the logistics? Again, it's me, right? If I take that logistics price, the price won't be 6 rupees, it will go for 9 rupees. Whether is it a valid deal for me? It is not a valid deal. So I cannot go for Bellary. Okay? Second thing what I have is interlocking bricks in the multi color is from Punjab. Why Punjab is showing instead of for me?
Executive: Interlocking bricks, uh, sir, I'm listening to me, please, only one second. I'm seeing your buyleads from Bellary, Karnataka, Hyderabad, Telangana. And, uh, interlocking bricks, Hyderabad, Telangana from, uh, an hour ago. And, uh, so, can we discuss on this, uh, interlocking bricks from, uh, Hyderabad, Telangana? Are we dealing in Hyderabad, Telangana or not?
Customer: I cannot deal. Again, you guys are asking the same question again and again, baba. What maximum I can handle is 100 kilometers from my pin code.
Customer: Hyderabad is 300, 280 kilometers away.
Executive: Sir, sir, sir, sir, sir. Can you, can you please tell me your exact location where you will deal, uh, from, uh, I'm 100 kilometers from my location.
Customer: Only 100 kilometers?
Executive: Yeah.
Executive: Sir, this is not possible in on IndiaMART because, uh, this is what I was telling from day one, na. This is what I'm telling from day one even before you guys called me. But you guys were the one who told me that. I'm, I'm, sir, sir, sir, sir. I'm not telling that. I'm not telling that. I'm, I'm, I want to say one second. [unintelligible] switches [unintelligible] computer [unintelligible] GST [unintelligible] invoice [unintelligible] 42 lakhs [unintelligible] 46 lakhs GST [unintelligible] half page [unintelligible] one week [unintelligible] hold [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Tell me, yeah. Uh, sir, can we connect on a video call?
Customer: And what?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Tell me.
Executive: Uh, sir, can we connect on a video call?
Customer: Video call?
Executive: Yes, yes, yes. In Google Meet?
Executive: Yes?
Customer: Okay, why?
Executive: Okay, uh, for your, uh, better understanding your buyleads, uh, fly ash brick related Bellary and preferred and not preferred locations.
Customer: Share me the link, share me it.
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: Sir, Sumit sir is calling you, please pick the phone.
Customer: I'm sorry?
Executive: Uh, my manager Sumit sir is now calling you, please pick the phone.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay. Thank you, sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants buyleads around Kurnool, not far away.

- Cannot deal with Hyderabad, Telangana buyleads.

- Wants to connect on video call.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's buyleads.

- Executive offered a video call for better understanding.



Next Steps: 

- Executive's manager calling customer, pick up the phone.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, video call
